name: Spring-mvc---hibernate-job-portal
tagline: It is simple job portal application implemented in Java with Spring Boot, Hibernate annotation, Velocity templates and Spring security.
body:
# Spring-MVC---Hibernate-Job-portal
It is job portal application implemented in Java with Spring Boot, Hibernate annotation, Velocity templates and Spring security.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
